availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George C. Hallet (Fulton Co colonel, attorney, county attorney, and city judge)

body.p: Fulton County, Kentucky, soldier and attorney. Served in the 40th Kentucky Militia Regiment of Fulton County as colonel in 1863. City judge of Hickman, Kentucky, in 1863. County attorney of Fulton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
_ Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989_, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Fulton County Wills, 1845-1923 (Accessed through ancestry.com on February 7, 2020), p. 87, p. 78 of microfilm.
The War of the Rebellion: A Compilation of the Official Records of the Union and Confederate Armies (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1889) Series I, Vol XXIII, Part I, 825-826.
KYR-0002-022-0005.
